alert.note: Alert for Putnam; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:28PM CDT until March 31 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sullivan County in north central Missouri... Central Putnam County in north central Missouri... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 328 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Milan, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milan, Unionville, Green City, Pollock, Reger and Lemons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Missouri.
